source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a dramatic scenery shot of a massive storm system. Dark, turbulent clouds loom over a vast, open grassland. Columns of heavy rain are visible falling in the distance.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a dramatic scenery shot of a massive storm system. Dark, turbulent clouds loom over a vast, open grassland. Columns of heavy rain are visible falling in the distance.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a flock of birds can be seen flying across the sky during the storm.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video is a dramatic scenery shot of a massive storm system. Dark, turbulent clouds loom over a vast, open grassland, while a flock of birds can be seen flying across the sky. Columns of heavy rain are visible falling in the distance.
